misc.catwalksinc.catwalk.info:
When placed, it connects automatically to neighbor catwalks, and also ladders, doors, gates and some other blocks.

If the connected-to block is at the higher elevation, catwalk will convert into stairs. 
  
Also hand-rails will not be placed when touching solid blocks and certain devices like hoppers.

Alternatively, each hand-rail can be enforced or disabled manually with Wrench.
